snippet: A New York Times poll found 1 in 5 Yankees fans have a favorable opinion of Alex Rodriguez, and about twice as many view him unfavorably.
abstract: New York Times poll finds that only 1 in 5 New York Yankees fans have a favorable opinion of Alex Rodriguez, and about twice as many view him unfavorably; analysis reveals that Rodriguez's unfavorable rating increased among Yankees fans as more became aware of doping allegations.
lead_paragraph: A New York Times poll found 1 in 5 Yankees fans have a favorable opinion of Alex Rodriguez, and about twice as many view him unfavorably.

headline.main: A Poll by The Times Finds That Rodriguez Is Alienating Many Yankees Fans
headline.print_headline: A Poll by The Times Finds That Rodriguez Is Alienating Many Yankees Fans
